PercentFund.shortDescription: Percentage of fund value after tax free cash

ValueGross.shortDescription: The total value of all fund holdings within all products in a portfolio

IncomeNet.shortDescription: The total income provided by all products within a portfolio in net

IncomeGross.shortDescription: The total income provided by all products within a portfolio in gross

AnnuitisedValueGross.shortDescription: The total value of all fund holdings within all products in a portfolio expressed as an annuity income, assuming conversion at the given simulation time step at prevailing simulated annuity rates

GuaranteedIncome.shortDescription: The total income provided by all products within a portfolio arising from guaranteed sources

Disinvestment.shortDescription: The withdrawals from the portfolio that is not taken as income

RequiredIncomeTarget.shortDescription: The total income required by the customer

IncomeShortfall.shortDescription: The incomeTarget less the income generated by all products in a portfolio (a shortfall against target is recorded as a positive number, and a surplus over target is negative)

IncomeShortfallRatio.shortDescription: The ratio of income generated by all products in a portfolio to the incomeTarget.

Nominal.shortDescription: Output money type in nominal values

Real.shortDescription: Output money type in real values

Poor.shortDescription: The percentile value for poor performance

Average.shortDescription: The percentile value for good performance

Strong.shortDescription: The percentile value for strong performance
